articles.title: ECJ's Super League judgement explained: UEFA, clubs, more - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Ceferin and UEFA still feel like they 'won' based on Thursday's judgement by the European Court of Justice, but this fight is far from over and the door's not closed on an eventual Super League. Here's what to make of today's news.
articles.content:
On Thursday, the European Court of Justice finally issued its judgement in the case pitting the remaining European Super League clubs (Barcelona and Real Madrid) against UEFA and FIFA.
